Sentence: What is a cookie ?

Label: None
Sentence: A cookie is a small amount of data that is placed in the browser of your computer or on your mobile device .

Label: None
Sentence: So-called  â€œ first party cookies â€� ( not as much fun as they sound ) are  cookies which are served by the entity operating the domain through  which the cookie is served .

Label: None
Sentence: Booking.com 's own cookies are therefore â€œ first party cookies â€� .

Label: None
Sentence: In  case we allow others to service cookies through the Booking.com  websites and apps , these cookies are so-called â€œ third party cookies  â€� .

Label: None
Sentence: In addition , there is a difference between session cookies and permanent cookies .

Label: None
Sentence: Session cookies will only exist until you close your browser .

Label: None
Sentence: Permanent cookies have a longer lifespan and are not automatically deleted once you close your browser .

Label: None
Sentence: We strive to serve cookies or allow the serving of cookies with a maximum lifespan of 5 years .

Label: None
Sentence: Only  in exceptional circumstances , such as for security purposes and where  absolutely necessary , will a cookie have a longer lifespan than that .

Label: None
Sentence: Next to cookies , other tracking technologies are used which are similar to cookies .

Label: None
Sentence: These  can include web beacons ( also known as pixel tags , web bugs or gifs )  , tracking URLs or software development kits ( SDKs ) .

Label: None
Sentence: A  web beacon is a tiny graphic image of just one pixel that can be  delivered to your computer as part of a web page request , in an app ,  in an advertisement or in an HTML email message .

Label: None
Sentence: Pixels  can be used to retrieve information from your device , such as your  device type or operating system , IP address , and time of visit .

Label: None
Sentence: They are also used to serve and read cookies in your browser .

Label: None
Sentence: Tracking URLs are used to understand from which referring website the Booking.com websites or apps are used .

Label: None
Sentence: SDKs are small pieces of code included in apps , which function like cookies and web beacons .

Label: None
Sentence: All these technologies are together referred to in this Cookie Statement as â€œ cookies â€� .
